mapper.insert: insert into t_car( uid, goods_id, goods_image, goods_title, goods_price, goods_num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) values( #{uid}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsNum}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: select id, goods_num AS goodsNum from t_car where uid=#{uid} AND goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: update t_car set goods_num=#{goodsNum} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, goods_id AS goodsId, goods_image AS goodsImage, goods_title AS goodsTitle, goods_price AS goodsPrice, goods_num AS goodsNum FROM t_car WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY id DESC
